answers.answer: That can be very serious. Especially if you are not drinking that much. To urinate that much, you should be constantly drinking water. I would definitely go to the doctor about this. If the problem is just the urgency to go frequently, but only a little bit comes out each time, you have a urinary tract infection, which can lead to worse things. If you are actually voiding a good amount of urine each time you go, you must be drinking that much water. Frequent urination can be signs of a bladder infection, overactive bladder, urinary tract infection, diabetes, certain STD's. Go to the dr.
You REALLY need to see a doctor, that is not normal at all.

question: my question is that i urinate way to often then normal. i can go 12-16 times every hour. even at night a am woke up from constent urination. if u have any advice on what it could possibly be or how serious it may be it would help me out alot. thank you for your time.
title: bladder control?
